title: foxglove.CompressedVideo
description: A single frame of a compressed video bitstream

frame_id.description: Frame of reference for the image. The origin of the frame is the optical center of the camera. +x points to the right in the image, +y points down, and +z points into the plane of the image.

data.description: Compressed video frame data. For packet-based video codecs this data must begin and end on packet boundaries (no partial packets), and must contain enough video packets to decode exactly one image (either a keyframe or delta frame).
